This is a testharness.js-based test.
[PASS] exercises an applyConstraints() - getSettings() cycle with PTZ permission granted
[PASS] exercises an applyConstraints() with required constraints with PTZ permission denied
[PASS] exercises an applyConstraints() with ideal constraints with PTZ permission denied
[FAIL] exercises an applyConstraints() with advances constraints with PTZ permission denied
  assert_unreached: applyConstraints should not throw an OverconstrainedError for {"advanced":[{"pan":8}]} Reached unreachable code
Harness: the test ran to completion.
